reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and comfortable, noting it's not tight around the neck and doesn't feel itchy or heavy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Chic & Perfect for Fall/Winter üçÇ
items.body: I really love this ZESICA turtleneck top! The knit material is soft, warm, and super comfortable without feeling itchy or heavy. The lantern sleeves give it a cute, stylish look, and the fit is slightly oversized in the best way. relaxed but still flattering. It‚Äôs perfect for fall and winter, and easy to dress up with jeans, leggings, or boots. The turtleneck sits comfortably without feeling tight, and the quality feels great for the price. Definitely a cozy staple I‚Äôll be wearing a lot! Read more
items.author: Kiaramary

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great sweater
items.body: Cute. Great color. Runs a little big, but is described as oversized so just size down. Washes well. Good value and versatile Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent purchase

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful lightweight sweater
items.body: The color is bright and beautiful. The length falls just right. The sweater is light weight, but still keeps you warm. It does not look like the picture, but I love how soft it feels. Read more
items.author: Butterfly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly Soft
items.body: This sweater is SO SOFT! Not itchy at all! It fits perfectly too, with a relaxed fit. I need it in all the colors now. Read more
items.author: Kahthrina Ruud

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is as beautiful as it looks.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Lightkhakiplaid, Wine, Royalblue, Lightkhaki, Black, Lake, Coffee, Orange, Peacock, Beige, Roseblack, Darkviolet, Grey, Maple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
